p.d: In four albums, the Moroccan singer-songwriter Oum has imposed herself as the radiant voice of a multi-facetted Morocco. Planned in Casablanca, designed in Paris and recorded in Berlin, under the artistic direction of Kamilya Jubran, "Daba" ("Now" in Arabic) puts the seal on a personal and artistic metamorphosis. Presented by: SÃ©bastien Folin; directed by: Philippe Sommet.
